title: While memorizing a verse that has Sujood At Tilawah, do I need to make Sujood every time? Assim al
transcript: says while memorizing a verse containing sujud prostration do i need to go for sujud each time i read or say it answers no this is not mandatory and even if you deliberately skip it not while memorizing it rather but while reciting it there's no sin in that inshallah you
